name: A & O Hotel & Hostel Friedrichshain

reviews.title: Great for schoolkids
reviews.text: Great place for schoolkids, and I am even looking into going back there for a weekend with my husband!

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.text: Location: fab. 20mins from Schoenefeld Airport, 10 mins to Alexanderplatz and only a short walk from the station. At first we were worried about the neighbourhood but we never encountered any problems, even late at night.

aka: a And o Hotel & Hostel Friedrichshain
